case.state: Yea! Let's do this!
Hi! I'm Adora and the legendary She Ra!
Hey. What's going on?
Is that two She-Ra? I just came here to play cards not have another existential crisis.
Hi! I'm Adora. You're cute.
Are you a ghost? No, I must be dreaming!
Is that a bug? It can talk?
So is playing against butterflies normal around here?
Are you a princess? Oh thank goodness! I was worried this was just going to be for fun.
Other princess are here? This must be a fancy establishment.
So I win and these girls take off their clothes? I've gone to heaven, I know it.
Is the Inventory just for girls? That's why Glimmer told me to come here!
Oh, all boys but me. OK. That's fine. Totally not weird.
You think you can take me on? Bring it boys.
All right, let's do this.
Hey, I'm looking for princesses to join a rebellion. Anyone know any? Oh, the game first? Okay, let's talk after.
So has anybody seen a rather mean cat lady? I was told she was around here.
I'll think it's best to change ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll change ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Are you even paying attention to what I'm saying?
Naked doesn't meant I'm out! I'll bring it back
Wait, this is really good! Like better than my other hands combined!
I'm not finished yet! I am good at improvising.
OK! Time for a last minute rescue.
Win or lose, let's just not stare for too long.
I dare you to beat me!
All according to plan!
I thought I was in trouble there for a moment.
Even Kyle could win with this! He sucks at this game, too!
That's the power of She-Ra! Not really, but you get the idea.
You're not gonna beat this hand or me.
I'll crush you as easily as Horde bots with this.
I think I got a very good hand. You'll let me know when I win, right?
Should I tell them? No I don't want to brag before we show our cards.
Why I couldn't I get a hand this good as Adora?
Fully clothed and a good hand. This is what we call a tactical advantage!
Wow! I might actually be better at this game than I thought.
All I had to do was give up my belt for a hand this good? Best trade I ever made!
These aren't Horde cards. What's the butt looking thing?
I guess I know how to play! All that research paid off!
Horde cards don't have kings or queens, just commanders and captains.
Oh thank goodness. I was sure that was going to be a bad swap.
So now I know that my luck is the same as Adora or She-Ra. Good to know.
She Ra isn't luckier than Adora. I always assumed but, I was still hoping.
Don't worry about winning. Worry about what will happen if you lose my clothes.
Not too good or too bad. It just depends on my opponent's hands.
Take your time to choose what cards you want. I can speak from experience. Rushing in is a dumb plan.
This is either very good or very bad!
OK I got this. I got this. I do it in private, so what is the difference if I do it in public?
I wonder who came up with this game? Maybe Bow knows.
There is a lot of waiting around naked in this game.
I just realized this is a game Sea Hawk plays when he goes out! All those smug looks he gave me when he mentioned it make sense now!
Oh. Ooh. I definitely did that wrong.
Well, that's just my luck. Terrible and a little ironic.
I will be brave! I will win in the end!
Wait, does adding the cards up not matter? I think Catra was messing with me when she told me that.
Where is the one card? I haven't seen any ones yet.
Why are these cards so small? I can't see them!
I am using a poker face. Is it working?
My luck is bad but not THIS bad!
I should not have chosen that swap. I should just accept my fate now.
Is this my punishment for all those times I showed off as She-Ra?
It's not all bad I hope. Hope is all I have right now.
Just reveal the cards so I can get this over with.
No! No! No! I'm so doomed!
Welcome to my team you two! I'm a little jealous. I hope this relationship lasts!
I'm actually on an adventure right now. I got to find this old spaceship in the middle of the desert. It is not as fun as this, that's for sure.
That's like Shadow Weaver and Catra. Neither of them are my friend anymore either. This is a weird coincidence.
Why do I have a familiar feeling right now? I have never been in a situation where a sadistic rival wants someone sexually. Have I?
I hope my butt looks half as good as yours when I am She-Ra.
Why do you wear holsters, but don't have anything in them? That seems like a waste.
What was that doing in your hair? Could I store things in my hair?
Is that a nude picture? Do you bring that everywhere?
That's some wonderful singing! I just learned about actual music not too long ago. Can you teach me some?
I think piercings are hot! That's so cool that you have one!

This is more of Bow's expertise, but I think that helping them work past it would be best. Anyone could solve any problem. Others are just better at certain issues. Like how I am good at kicking Horde butt.
No I don't play many games ~name~.
I grew up in a military camp. My squad mates were like family to me. I miss them but they're still fighting for a bad cause.
That about sums it up. Relics, people, old buildings, they are mostly walking and then almost dying. Sometimes there's new friends so it isn't all bad.
Ghosts! Obviously!
I don't know, maybe an hour? It's when Mermista showed me the joys of bathing.
Transforming into a giant warrior woman is pretty cool! It has its uses. You should try it if you get the chance.
I wonder if those golems could help repair first one structures? They are all in need of it.
Always happy to help out a cute girl and make new friends!
Can your magic sword turn you into a larger version of yourself? No? Well it looks nice.
Hi there, ~name~. I'm Adora. So you're a cat person huh? I had a friend like that.
I happen to be a cat person. Not as much as you, it seems. Because you are wearing a cat suit.
I just got to use a poker face
I know how to make a convincing poker face. In battle that is. I'm really struggling right now.
Well you can't win without taking a few hits. At least I don't.
Me? Well, I am winning so I guess it's fair.
I guess you earned a little more She Ra skin.
Do you want to see something cool?
I could get more layers of clothing with She-Ra. I hope this is allowed.
Well I shouldn't use She-Ra the whole time. It seems unfair, cause I'm so hot.
I don't got much left. I can't lose my lead.
Well I might be winning but this is going to be close!
You got me. I'll go down honorably.
So I have to take my clothes off? Any of my clothes?
Think I am out of ideas? I still got a surprise up my sleeve!
If I am She-Ra, does that mean I can use her clothing too?
Well, I can't win them all. I know that from experience.
Dang you got me, but can you do it again?
Dang! Well I am not done yet!
Well, I should go back to normal and strip there. She-Ra isn't big on underwear.
OK, you got me again. I think you've earned this.
Oh I can't show that off I'm sorry. Just give me some time to mentally prepare myself.
Do you guys prefer She-Ra? I will show you naked She-Ra if you let me transform again.
This isn't over yet! I still got one more round in me! Give it everything you got!
I guess I have to take off something. Like my uh...belt!
Just my jacket will do, right? I am still keeping my sword close by.
More? Let's see if you want more after you see me but bigger!
Do you know how long it takes to doff armor? Changing back to normal would be faster!
I should never have listened to Sea Hawk's gambling tips.
This is really bad! Glimmer, I need help! Wait, Adora, calm down! You got this!
I'll take the help of Swiftwind at this point! And he's a very self centered horse!
Get your head in the game Adora! You are losing here!
I am losing this badly? This never happens when I play regular poker with Glimmer and Bow!
It's not like I needed this belt anyway. It doesn't hold onto anything.
So where do these items go? I can get it back later right?
I like this jacket but the shoulder pads are a bit much.
If anyone takes my jacket I will fight you.
I am just taking off the jacket and keeping my sword close by.
For the honor of Greyskull!
I like these gauntlets. I never use them, but still.
These gauntlets are doing their job of protecting me.
I hope you got a good look because I'm changing back to normal.
Did you not like me being She Ra? I'm sorry I can switch back.
Let's get this off. It's army grade so it's really difficult! AH!
This shirt is so hard to remove! Can I get some help?
For the honor of Greyskull!
You got me again. Alright, take a long look because it's back to Adora.
I'll let you peek before I swap back. You're welcome.
I might be close to losing but at least I feel sexier now. Thanks for letting me have some time to psych myself up.
I am in a wet dream. Or a beautiful simulation. That happens more often than you'd think.
Oh, what have I gotten into this time?
I wonder if any of the boys here are skilled with weapons like bow.
So... How are you? My social training did not prepare me for this.
Alright, let's keep going. I've not yet begun to fight.
I am going to miss that belt.
I got that jacket back in my horde days. Probably the nicest thing from that place. The Fright Zone doesn't have many nice things.
This is shirt is pretty tight. It's from an army uniform and made to be efficient in combat. Not so much in strip poker. Ha...
To be fair I'll take off my tiara. I still have to take something off.
I am still going to take this off. It's the rules to remove clothing after each loss. If you don't like it then fight me for more. I prefer to settle it in a fight anyway.
Dang! Alright let's get serious!
I am not going to lose now. The gloves are off! Well sort of.
So I gotta take of my boots? It's the best option with what I got.
I really don't want to stand on this ground in leggings. They can chafe so easily.
This feels different than a horde physical evaluation.
Okay, I finished stripping. Give me cards to cover my nipples with, please.
So, I just feel more confident as She-Ra. I mean, look at this.
I know it's cheep, but it's fun, and who is going to stop me?
What? Would you rather not see a nude She-Ra?
My heart is beating as fast as when I am fighting! This is so exciting!
I miss being She-Ra already. No, Adora, you got this!
You are the host of this game right? Well even you must follow the rules.
I get the feeling that you might have dirty motivations for inviting me.
It's your turn!
Oh hey it's our host's turn.
So can I see your muscles?
Hey don't be shy. I'm sure you look good.
Don't be intimidated by all of this gorgeous muscle. I'm not going to judge.
I think I understand why you're a regular here.
Did you lose on purpose so you could look at She-Ra for longer?
Well, it's fair. I followed the rules and so do you now.
I hope you like the show at least.
Hold on, I want to watch this.
You might not be the winner yet! You still have to try!
This is awkward.
Wait. Kyle? Why are you in a bed sheet?
Kyle? Are you dead? Was it Catra?
Kyle! Why are you here?
Kyle? Don't haunt me!
Well I won't look if that makes you feel more comfortable.
If I don't look then you can't either.
Oh ~name~ is up. Let's see what they got now.
It's not me. Thank goodness.
I wonder if Bow would play this game. Then at least I would have a friend here.
Hey don't be shy! I will flex next to you if you need.
Show the girls what you got!
Just make it something good.
Don't be shy. No one can judge you if I can do something about it.
Don't stare at me while you do that!
Don't be shy. I'll distract everyone for you.
Please don't look at me. I still have to catch my breath.
You're going to want to get comfortable. Trust me!
Do I look sexy to you? I guess I will be able to tell after you strip.
You're up! Keep it interesting!
Adora wins again!
You can lose? Wait, I thought the house always wins.
I won't look. No that's a lie.
So you wanted to play against me huh? Interesting.
So what's your name? ~human~? That's a good name.
You are the game master right? You are cute!
Don't be shy. I promise I will look.
You're a cutie! You should flaunt that!
Let's see it. My hopes are up already.
I like where this is going!
You want to join me?
Can I have what you take off?
Well at least I am not masturbating, yet.
Well this is getting interesting!
I am masturbating while a girl strips in front of me. Wow.
Oh that's a good spot!
Oh this is hot! I mean... I'm not looking.
Well at least you aren't alone.
Look at you! It's your turn to strip!
I just might start again if you make it good!
This will be good.
Is that a ghost? What is going on in this place?
So you have an intrest in a girl huh? I think I might be able to be your wingwoman after this game.
I can't tell if she's taking this game seriously or not. I am intrigued though.
I can't pick both? If I had to pick, I think a moth girl would be more my speed.
Now I'm thinking how good ~name~ is in bed.
I think Swiftwind would appreciate that at least. That's my horse. He claims he's his own horse but he calls himself my steed. It's confusing.
Wait She-Ra! But- How- Oh wait you're not She-Ra.
You remind me of a friend. Well she used to be my friend.
There is more than one super powerful, tall, blond, princess, from another world?
You're a princess? Oh thank goodness! I was worried I would be alone.
You must be as much as horny as Entrapta to play strip poker. Well, I am playing too so I can't judge.
Why would a princess play this? Never mind, I know Perfuma and Mermista.
Hi, I'm Adora. Good to meet you ~name~.
Wait. You remind me of Shadow Weaver. Only less evil. She might actually be good now.
Girls. Wow.
Oh it's your turn ~name~
~name~ lost. Please make it a show.
My heart is pounding right now.
I thought I was going to lose there.
I guess transforming was worth it!
You want a feel of my guns while you strip ~name~?
I won't judge until you strip, I promise.
Who lost? I guess I'll find out soon enough.
Yep. Being naked was worth it.
Well at least all eyes are on you now.
I am not forced to touch myself. That's a relief.
Oh please be something big! I am already super horny.
Mind giving me something to work with?
I don't know if I should look or not.
Ah! That's a good spot!
It's ~name~? Yes!
Well I'm nude already so you shouldn't be nervous.
I think this will be fun!
It's not so bad down here on my level.
Did you throw that hand just for me?
We used to settle this with a fight in the horde! Oh? That's not how it works here?
In the fright zone we settled this in a death match!
I don't see any real combat use for that item. How would that help in a one on one fight?
Put the safety on!
Trigger discipline soldier!
That was a live weapon?!
I hate this game.
That's it? Your ~clothing~?
Hey I am going to take some extra stuff off next time I lose.
You have that left? No way!
Wait that counts? Really?
You're worse than Shadow Weaver for counting that!
Did you want a reaction? Come on I am not done with you.
One more down. Let's see you keep that up.
Is that it?
I will cut your ~clothing~ in half!
Do you want to make me mad?
Are you from the Horde? They call them evil for a reason!
You still have one of those?
I'm naked here! Play nice!
You don't get to look when you take off that!
Is this a joke?
Did Catra set you up for this?
Let's move on now please.
This is worse than Catra's teasing.
Let's just get back to it.
Well, it's just tactical I guess.
Wait that was the only thing?
Extra stuff huh? Understandable.
Well I don't know if I should be happy or upset at that.
Next hand, let's do it!
You might be good, but I specialize in comebacks! I do it once a week!
Let's stick to the rules and move on.
I am a princess so show some respect!
Well I guess it could be worse. Nothing comes to mind but life likes to surprise me.
Well that's just rude.
That isn't cute! Frosta is cute. You are like Hordak.
I've already started so might as well just continue.
That's a way to kill the mood.
She dropped something. Should we clean that up for her?
Doesn't that seem a little extreme?
Is there a girl equivalent to being blue balled?
Did a butterfly magically transform into a blond woman? I've never related to a bug before.
Um ~name~? Your skirt is a little short to kneel like that. Are you sure that's military clothing?
Hold on. Are you saying you can transform too? Well that's interesting. Want to compare what it's like later?
I don't think that was supposed to happen.
I am so glad to meet another princess. I understand why you weren't forward with that information. It's dangerous for us.
You are as bad as Hordak!
I am naked over here!
I was hoping for more. I was told this was going to be more fun.
Wait really? I need to go over what can count in this game again.
Just your ~clothing~? It's not much but the game is just starting. It still is rather boring.
Am I losing that bad?
Wait you have that?
That could count?
Seriously?
It's a tactical choice.
It's what I would do.
This game is unfair.
I guess I could fap to that.
I wish I had anything like that right now.
You tease more than Catra.
I knew there was a reason I liked you so much.
This game is supposed to remove the mystery.
This is terrible.
I was hoping that it would be more dramatic.
Well let's keep going.
We got plenty of game left.
Just deal the next hand please.
Well alright.
Just deal the next round.
What's the point of that?
Don't get cocky.
I'll still beat you!
I've had worse odds.
I am naked and you just remove your ~clothing~. You are asking for a beating!
Please just deal in the new hand.
That just makes me want to try harder!
Back to what I was doing!
Now that is over I have something to do!
You don't get to watch after that!
This is worse than Catra's constant nagging.
That can count?
Well if you have it then use it.
Not the worst scenario.
I'll get past your defenses and win!
Well it's only fair!
Did you get distracted?
It's your ~clothing~ huh?
No need to be shy you are just playing the game.
Well add it to the pile.
Guys have those? Bow doesn't even wear a shirt right.
Oh this feels great!
Well I was really far behind.
I was losing bad it seems.
That is not a good way to make friends. Even I know that.
Well that's just unfair!
I was hoping for more.
Hope you don't get distracted! That was a joke, I really hope you're distracted now.
Let's just move on and get to the the good stuff shall we?
Let's keep this ball rolling!
My plan is working perfectly! That's right I planned for every possible hand!
Well that was something. Yep.
Is this how you make friends?
Do you have more clothes than Seahawk?
You are doing well but not better than me!
Well at least no one will miss it.
You are losing items to get rid of. You better be careful.
We didn't have those in the horde.
Don't rub in my loss!
I am going to need to update my plan. Can you give me some pointers?
I lost SO hard.
Don't panic it is just investigating you because you smell good.
My friend Perfuma told me how to deal with these creatures. Just don't panic and watch it go find its food.
Was that supposed to happen?
Yes I am. Thank you for asking. I don't know how to flirt back. ~human~ can you help me out here?
Are you dead? I knew it but I wish I was wrong! Stay back! I will hit you!
According to my experience with- oh, you're already taking it off. Alright then.
I have a sword to use magic! Why is that in you?
That looks like one of Shadow Weaver's experiments! Are you okay?
I would just punch them in the face ~name~. I do it all the time.
Well this is just unfair!
I can't be losing that bad!
I like where this is going!
This is the best game!
You are taking off your ~clothing~?
You wanted this didn't you?
Your ~clothing~ looks pretty cool!
Well it's not much but it'll do.
Not the best but, it could be worse.
Not bad but I am going to win more.
You have my attention.
Oh there!
Well that was underwhelming.
Is this one of your kinks?
I am bad at this game.
This has to be one of Catra's schemes.
Should I hit that thing with my sword? It seems harmless.
I'm sorry, I didn't know. If you want to put the gloves back on I would let you get a free round.
Next hand please.
Well it's not all bad I guess.
You're going to have to strip more! You'll see!
Next hand please!
Let's keep going. If you are done that is.
Let's hope that's not the last time you lose.
Well the tension is rising now!
You can be brave!
Not bad but could be better.
Let's keep this going.
Hey that's a good look for you.
Just keep playing so I have something to masturbate to.
This was not a good game for me.
Can I have that? Please?
Bet you felt overdressed with that ~clothing~.
Don't be a Kyle and take it all off!
Well let's see if you have embarrassing underwear like Bow.
Be grateful these aren't horde rules.
Do you want some help with your ~clothing~?
Well time to put you clothes where you mouth is... or something.
Even if your body doesn't compare to mine you still have to strip.
If you are shy I could blast it off.
You aren't hiding your excitement well. At least not anymore.
You want to focus on someone else?
I'm not looking. Nope. Not at all.
It's nothing I haven't seen. I was in a co-ed barracks.
Getting too hot for you over there?
Well I am not looking at that.
Well this is usually when Kyle bursts in anyway.
I was so close to winning.
You look like you are getting nervous.
I'll give you some tips after the game.
I am dryer than the Crimson Wastes over here.
Oh thank goodness I can't see your sword.
You shouldn't feel like this game is even. I still got tricks.
Do all guys around here shave? Weird.
I know like three guys and you are showing just as much skin as two of them.
Hey you don't look half bad.
Let's keep this up.
You feel that tension? That's the power of She Ra.
Don't get too confident! I am still in this!
Well that's certainly more of a stranger than I wanted to see.
Why do guys have so many clothes? Bow has three things on at a time.
Well this could be better.
Hey you look insanely good! You got any tips?
Go to the next hand already I am getting close!
But you have that choker, your shoes, and hair clips. Are you acting right now?
I can respect that. I wish there were half of the people with your bravery in the world.
That is totally logical and super fun! From one extra terrestrial to another; do you think we could team up?
You're also a regular girl? There is no shame in transforming early. I might be able to help with that.
This game is awesome!
I love it when a plan comes together!
Well we're both almost naked.
This is hot right? Yea this is too hot.
Whoa this is great!
Now this is what I came here for!
You want to show off too?
She-Ra has that affect on women.
Well you are still doing better than me.
You might have more clothes but I'm going to win.
Well at least this game is forgiving.
Yea flaunt it!
Well at least I am entertained.
Wow I lost but I still feel like a winner.
That's nothing to be ashamed of. You are a strong warrior.
I know what those scars mean. I might be able to help. I know a lot of people who can help you feel better. I could help out to if you want.
Oh you're like Flutterina! That makes much more sense. On that note, do you want to join a rebellion?
Next hand please. I want to continue not losing.
Can we move on so I don't have to stand here for too long.
Feeling intimidated?
This might be the luckiest I've ever been!
Well this is a close game.
Winning isn't fun if it isn't close. Yea that's it.
I'm getting greedy. I guess it's the horde in me.
Are you getting nervous? Well don't panic and you'll be fine.
Aw slow down I was just getting good.
That's a good way to get me going!
Would it be weird to go again?
Does the idea of joining me turn you on? Enough to lose on purpose?
How did that even happen?
Get down!
Is this Shadow Weaver? It looks like her magic!
What are you talking about ~name~?
Mind taking the attention off me?
I wanted some tits.
Do you want some workout tips then strip?
So you're taking that off? Well you'll look like Bow.
I am a fan of muscles. Let's see what you got.
Well get to it.
Do you train your abs as well? Let's find out!
Let's see it.
Don't feel intimidated. You look fit and sexy.
These are what real muscles look like!
Oh thank goodness it's not me right now.
Well it's not anything I haven't seen.
Don't look at me while I am getting into it.
Entrapta would love to experiment on you. Nipples or not. She might just add nipples to find a purpose to them.
Is Shadow Weaver here? She could do that, but I don't think she would!
Don't worry it's not as bad as you are thinking it will be.
Well you look fit! Want to work out sometime?
Not bad.
Well I shouldn't stare.
You can already see most of my chest. It's only fair.
Are guys not embarrassed to show their nipples? Is that just an Inventory thing?
Not bad but try working on your laterals.
Hey you're looking solid!
Well this is unfair.
Rogelio always got embarrassed when he took his shirt off. I wonder why.
I see Bow's stomach everyday! It's nothing weird.
Well at least it's getting interesting!
Hey only one of us should be shy right now.
Just be proud you didn't unsheathe your sword earlier.
I would get in trouble at the horde for looking. Not anymore!
Do I have to look?
Girls rule!
You lost and you got to face the consequences.
Well this is in my winning strategy but I didn't really want it to be.
Don't compare your sword to mine.
If I was a guy, would my dick get bigger when I am She-Ra?
Well this is going to be awkward,
Ready to get on my level?
Please don't wave it in my face.
Well I mean I have toys that look like a penis, so it's not too different.
That wasn't too hard. Hahaha! Get it?
You shouldn't look over here unless you want to get more shy.
Don't be embarrassed because your dick is out, be embarrassed that I am destroying this game.
Don't they get bigger?
Why do guys brag about that?
Oh it's not as bad as I thought it would be.
Oh, I was worried for nothing.
I don't think I could even feel that inside of She Ra.
I thought that your sword would have been bigger.
Hey nice ass!
Don't point that thing at me.
I bet that feels better.
Geez Glimmer what do you see in these?
I know a few girls and guys who would love to see that! I can get you hooked up after the game.
Well at least I got to see it. It's only fair because you saw mine.
Not bad. You're as big as Bow. According to Glimmer at least.
This is an overwhelming victory!
Huh it looks like one of Glimmer's toys.
You got a nice rear there.
I was worried it was going to look like Hordak's. That is not something you forget. It was an accident but I was running laps for hours as punishment.
You have a nice one there! Is that weird?
Nice ass.
This is down to the wire and I never give up!
Keep your head in the game and you can still win. So, let's see who comes out on top! Not sexually.
It's neck and neck! This game really is fun!
Well that's right at my head level. Please be careful.
I'm at waist height so please don't swing around too much.
Were you hiding that the whole time?
How was that in your pants?
That is the size of one of Mermista's toys!
Were you throwing just so you could show me your dick!
How is that supposed to fit in anything?
Wow it's like those actors in those old Horde promotional videos.
How were you hiding that?
Now that's a weapon!
That is pretty big. Is it natural or magic?
Don't point that at me!
Well nice ass, and well, you know.
Well that's huge! Is it real?
That's a big dick. I imagine it hurts.
I think it might be attracted to your perfume or something.
